name: Chibi Stars
description:
Join the Chibi Stars in this magical puzzle adventure game.
Connect the same stars to complete each puzzle. Try to connect as many stars as you can to beat the game but you only have a set amount of moves so choose wisely.

**FEATURES**

(: 5 Worlds ;)

Earth,Mountains,Volcano,Sea, and Snow

(: 85 Levels :)

Each level gets harder as you move through the game. There are different obstacles and challenges to play against. Match and connect stars in square shapes to maximize your move.

(: Awesome Combos :)

You can connect squares of the same color stars to make combos and cover other stars to create bombs and clear the level.

(: Bombs :)

Bombs can be used to break barriers to reach the stars.

We hope you enjoy the game!
